title: Why I can't download pbe
body: I can't download pbe in 60% and i see error occurred 004 ... pls help

replies.body: Sorry for the trouble here.  The error code might be indicating a security setting that's not letting your game files update and install correctly.  Start with the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help get that access restored.
